cleaned_text: Image 1 of 4 Image 2 of 4 Image 3 of 4 Image 4 of 4 IN PERSON POP*UP - Digital Detox Sound Meditation $44.00 Join us IN-PERSON for an awesome soundbath with Eric Mellgren on Sunday, February 26th at 4:30 - 6:00pm at the beautiful space at Re/Creation. This special event will guide us on a powerful journey of self-discovery and relaxation. The meditation session will be led by expert Mindfulness Facilitator, Ceri Bethan, and will be followed by a soothing Sound Bath with world-renowned practitioner, Eric Mellgren. These powerful healing sounds will help you release tension, stress, and negative energy, leaving you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. *Address will be sent upon confirmation. All sales are final. We look forward to seeing you
